languages.text: "В следующей битве на арене вы будете со мной! Прольем кровь ксеносов!"
"In the next fight, you are coming with me! We shall make the arena drink of xenos blood!"
languages.original_text: "В следующей битве на арене вы будете со мной! Прольем кровь ксеносов!"

traits.locale_text: "In the next fight, you are coming with me! We shall make the arena drink of xenos blood!"
"In the next fight, you are coming with me! We shall make the arena drink of xenos blood!"
"In the next fight, you are coming with me! We shall make the arena drink of xenos blood!"

"In the next fight, you are coming with me! We shall make the arena drink of xenos blood!"

languages.text: 「次の試合では、私と一緒に来てもらう！アリーナに異種族の血をたっぷり流してやるんだ！」
languages.original_text: "In the next fight, you are coming with me! We shall make the arena drink of xenos blood!"

traits.locale_text: 「次の試合では、私と一緒に来てもらう！アリーナに異種族の血をたっぷり流してやるんだ！」

languages.text: “下一场战斗开始的时候，你们和我一起来！咱们要让这座竞技场好好尝尝那些异形的血！”
languages.original_text: "In the next fight, you are coming with me! We shall make the arena drink of xenos blood!"

traits.locale_text: “下一场战斗开始的时候，你们和我一起来！咱们要让这座竞技场好好尝尝那些异形的血！”

languages.text: «¡Vendrás conmigo en el próximo combate! ¡Haremos que la arena se empape de sangre xenos!».
languages.original_text: "In the next fight, you are coming with me! We shall make the arena drink of xenos blood!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Vendrás conmigo en el próximo combate! ¡Haremos que la arena se empape de sangre xenos!».

languages.text: "Im nächsten Kampf kommt Ihr mit mir! Wir ertränken die Arena im Blut der Xenos!"
languages.original_text: "In the next fight, you are coming with me! We shall make the arena drink of xenos blood!"

traits.locale_text: "Im nächsten Kampf kommt Ihr mit mir! Wir ertränken die Arena im Blut der Xenos!"

languages.text: « Lors du prochain combat, vous viendrez avec moi ! Et ensemble, nous abreuverons l'arène de sang xénos ! »
languages.original_text: "In the next fight, you are coming with me! We shall make the arena drink of xenos blood!"

traits.locale_text: « Lors du prochain combat, vous viendrez avec moi ! Et ensemble, nous abreuverons l'arène de sang xénos ! »

languages.text: "Bir sonraki savaşımda yanımda olacaksınız! Arena, zeno kanına doyacak!"
languages.original_text: "In the next fight, you are coming with me! We shall make the arena drink of xenos blood!"

traits.locale_text: "Bir sonraki savaşımda yanımda olacaksınız! Arena, zeno kanına doyacak!"
